item.trans: n. 旗帜，横幅；标语 同义词:slogan, oriflamme China Daily bannered the news that the American president would visit China.《中国日报》头版以通栏大字标题发表美国总统将访华的消息。
adj. 机械的；力学的；呆板的；无意识的；手工操作的 同义词:wooden, automatic, dead A soul has to be found in a mechanical act , the soulless labor of operating a camera.我们必须在机械的行为和没有灵魂的照相机操作过程中找到灵魂。
n. 引擎，发动机；机车，火车头；工具 同义词:facilities, instrument, vehicle, tool, gear The pilot managed to fly the damaged bomber in safely on one engine .飞行员靠一台发动机设法使损坏了的轰炸机安然降落。
vi. 哭泣；流泪；哀悼；滴落；渗出液体 vt. 哭泣；流泪；悲叹；流出或渗出液体 n. 哭泣；眼泪；滴下 同义词:water, shed tears, shed tears, pipe one's eye, tears, eyedrop James broke down and wept.詹姆斯控制不住感情哭了。
n. 异议，反对；缺陷，缺点；妨碍；拒绝的理由 同义词:opposition, exception, intervention, prevention, deficiency The defense attorney 's objection was overruled by the judge .被告辩护律师提出的反对意见被法官驳回。
n. 醋 同义词:acetum You can imagine their surprise to find out that it was almost a hundred percent vinegar !你可以想像得出当他们发现那调料几乎是百分之百的醋时他们惊讶的神情。

vt. 控制；精通；征服 n. 硕士；主人；大师；教师 adj. 主人的；主要的；熟练的 同义词:possess, contain, regulate, bit, bottle, teacher, professor, artist, host, great, experienced, primary, major, skilled, central She has never mastered the art of public speaking.她从没掌握演讲的艺术。
n. 成就；完成；达到 同义词:effort, completion, success, execution, accomplishment Success would be the avoidance of catastrophe , hardly an achievement that invites acclaim .避免灾难就是胜利，这很难说是什么值得喝采的成就。
adv. 很，大大地；非常 同义词:quite, badly, too, extremely, far, highly He greatly influenced the development of China's culture and education .他对中国文化和教育的发展产生了深远的影响。
n. 骨；骨骼；香烟；一首歌 vt. 剔去...的骨；施骨肥于 vi. 苦学；专心致志 to bone chicken (或 turkey)剔除鸡(或火鸡)的骨头

adj. 最重要的；最先的 adv. 首先；居于首位地 同义词:principal, supreme, main, lead, firstly, primarily, initially, first of all, chiefly First and foremost , road safety consciousness is generally not firmly ingrained in Singaporeans .一个基本的问题是，国人并没有根深蒂固的公路安全意识。
n. 市长 同义词:burgomaster, demarch " We can only make achievements with scale , " says the mayor , a former tractor factory engineer .曾经是拖拉机厂工程师的赵市长说，“我们只能通过规模来取得成就。”
adv. 最近；重新；以新的方式 同义词:recently, of late, last He says they need to discuss the newly revealed document with their supporters .他说，他们需要同他们的支持者讨论新透露出来的文件。

adv. 错误地；邪恶的，不正当地 n. 坏事；不公正 adj. 错误的；失常的；不适当的 vt. 委屈；无理地对待；诽谤 同义词:in error, incorrectly, bad, injustice, false, incorrect, unhappy, improper, inadequate, vilify, asperse The policeman wronged him and sent him to prison.警察冤 枉了他，把他送进了监狱。
adj. 高级的；年长的；地位较高的；年资较深的，资格较老的 n. 上司；较年长者；毕业班学生 同义词:older, advanced, high, superior officer, nibs Joseph, Sr.大约瑟夫
n. 撤退；休息寓所；撤退 vi. 撤退；退避；向后倾 vt. 退（棋）；使后退 同义词:withdrawal, pullback, withdraw, bug out The enemy was forced to retreat from the city.敌人被迫撤出这个城市。
vt. 反对；对抗，抗争 vi. 反对 同义词:combat, sit down on, object, sit down on His motion was opposed by most members.他的提议遭到大多数成员的反对。

n. 农民；乡下人 同义词:farmer, provincial Eggs were often wrapped in gold leaf or , if you were a peasant , colored brightly by boiling them with the leaves or petals of certain flowers .人们常常用金色的叶子包裹复活蛋，或是农民的做法：将复活蛋画得色彩斑斓，并把它和叶子或是真花瓣一起煮沸。
n. 微电脑；[计] 微型计算机 A commonly used microcomputer algorithm for multiplication .微型计算机一种常用的乘法算法。
vt. 播送，播放；（无线电或电视）广播；播撒（种子） vi. 广播，播送；播放 n. 广播；播音；广播节目 adj. 广播的 同义词:play, send over, send over, Pingback We broadcast the news to the local population every morning.我们每天上午向当地居民播送新闻。
vt. 使出汗；流出；使干苦活；剥削；藉出汗减轻；焦急地期待 n. 汗；水珠；焦急；苦差使 vi. 出汗；辛苦工作；懊恼；结水珠 同义词:stream, shed, sudor, globule, smart, labour over to sweat much出了许多汗
adj. 显然的；表面上的 同义词:transparent, decided, patent Japan feels less threatened , however , by Iran's apparent intention to build nuclear weapons .但是，对伊朗明显制造核武器的动机，日本却很少感到威胁。
n. 岩石；摇滚乐；暗礁 vt. 摇动；使摇晃 vi. 摇动；摇晃 同义词:covers, pena, shake, swing motion, wave, roll, shake Stop rocking the chair;you are making so much noise.别摇晃椅子啦，你真吵得慌。

n. 家伙；朋友；同事；会员 adj. 同伴的，同事的；同道的 vt. 使…与另一个对等；使…与另一个匹敌 同义词:apple, customer, friend, member, guy, companionate If no one in our household reacts to our desperate need , I'd advise all fellow flower addicts to buy themselves some flowers immediately .如果我们中没有人对这种迫切要求有所反应，我建议所有对花卉着迷的人立即为自己买一些花卉。
n. 种类；方式；品质 vi. 分类；协调；交往 vt. 将…分类；将…排序；挑选出某物 同义词:category, manner, way of, variety, kind, mode, nature, travel, company, mix, associate, concert, systematize to sort apples by grade按等级把苹果分类
n. 装饰；[建][服装] 装饰物；教堂用品 vt. 装饰，修饰 同义词:decoration, adornment, paint, hang, modify, bedeck to ornament the house with flowers and colour lights用鲜花和彩灯装饰房屋
n. 象征；符号；标志 同义词:significant, seal, indication, flag Blue symbols sadness and sometimes coarseness.蓝色有时象征沉闷悲哀，有时又象征淫秽。
n. 张力；拉紧；负担；扭伤；血缘 vi. 拉紧；尽力 vt. 拉紧；滥用；滤去；竭力 同义词:tension, burden, weight, tauten, take pains, abuse, tighten up to strain a rope拉紧绳子
n. 兴趣，爱好；利息；趣味；同行 vt. 使……感兴趣；引起……的关心；使……参与 同义词:like, fond of It interests me enormously.这让我感兴趣。
n. 碟，盘；一道菜 vt. 把…装盘；使成碟状 vi. 成碟状；闲谈 同义词:plate, course, visit, chin music She dished the food onto plates.她把食物盛在盘上。
adj. 临终的，垂死的 n. 死，死亡 v. 死，死亡；枯萎；失去活力（die的ing形式） 同义词:fey, death, deadness, perishing How many people died in the war?在这次战争中有多少人死亡?

adv. 完全地，彻底地；完整地 同义词:entirely, totally, thoroughly, fully, absolutely, strictly, perfectly The report does say basic math skills must be taught completely in the early years of school .报告并没有说基本的数学技巧一定要在上学早期就完全教给学生。
n. 农业；农艺，农学 同义词:farming, extractive industry Agriculture : rice , jute , tea , wheat ; beef .农业：水稻，黄麻，茶，小麦，牛肉。
vt. 分享，分担；分配 vi. 共享；分担 n. 份额；股份 同义词:participate in, portion, partake, stock, lot the prize shared by the two由二人分享的奖金
n. 领导能力；领导阶层 The first requirement is political leadership , especially from America and China .首先要求的是政治表率，尤其是美国和中国。
n. 移动；变化；手段；轮班 vi. 移动；转变；转换 vt. 转移；改变；替换 同义词:variation, removal, move, instrument, motion, to move, forward motion, influence, fashion, vary to shift backward向后移动
vi. 复制；复印；抄袭 vt. 复制；复印；抄袭 n. 副本；一册；摹仿 同义词:to duplicate, print off, repeat, lift, repeat, counterpart She immediately copied the letter in her notebook.她立即把这封信抄在她的笔记本里。
n. 气候；风气；思潮；风土 同义词:weather, terroir The climate there is tropical .那里的气候是炎热的。
vt. 使竖立；建造；安装 adj. 竖立的；笔直的；因性刺激而勃起的 vi. 直立；勃起 同义词:construct, fit, fix, structure, frame, straight, upright, to stand on end, get it up to erect a house盖房
v. 调查；研究 同义词:check into, inquire into to investigate a murder调查谋杀案
n. 小巷；航线；车道；[篮球]罚球区 同义词:vector, driveway Do you know the chicken man who lives across the lane ?你知道那个在小胡同的交叉口卖烤鸡的人吗？
n. 地窖；酒窖；地下室 vt. 把…藏入地窖 同义词:basement, earth pit Stop exaggerating and get me the pet carrier from cellar .别再继续夸大了，帮我把宠物篮子从地下室拿出来。
n. 食堂，小卖部；水壶 同义词:mess, refectory As for meals , tickets can be bought in the student canteen every day .至于伙食，学生饭堂每天都可以买到饭菜票。
vi. 爆炸，爆发；激增 vt. 使爆炸；爆炸；推翻 同义词:blow apart, burst up, shoot, spring, blast The bomb and other explosive exploded.炸弹和其他爆炸物爆炸了。
vt. 排出；耗尽；使精疲力尽；彻底探讨 vi. 排气 n. 排气；废气；排气装置 同义词:issue, drain out, air out, air discharge, flue gas I have exhausted myself working.我工作得精疲力竭。
adj. 丰富的；许多的；丰饶的 同义词:abundant, numerous, multiple, many, full They are happy to park children in crèches, which remain more plentiful than in the west .把孩子寄放到托儿所她们感到很高兴，东部比西部保留了更多的托儿所。
vt. 阻止，禁止 同义词:stem, block, dispute, bar, discourage We are prohibited from drinking alcohol during working hours.工作时间内我们不得喝酒。
n. 监视器；监听器；监控器；班长 vt. 监控 同义词:detectophone, invigilator You must monitor the old man's illness.你一定要监察这位老人的病情。
n. 图表；曲线图 vt. 用曲线图表示 同义词:chart, diagram It is useful to partition a graph into its components .把一个图分解成它的分支，是很有益的。

vt. 喜欢；想；愿意 vi. 喜欢；希望 prep. 像；如同 adj. 同样的；相似的 n. 爱好；同样的人或物 adv. 可能 conj. 好像 同义词:love, think, prefer, affect, as per, similar, alike, interest, bent, fond of, perhaps, maybe, supposedly, on the cards, forse Tom is like his father in looks.汤姆的相貌像他父亲。
n. 哈欠；裂口 vi. 打呵欠；裂开 vt. 张开；打著呵欠说 同义词:breakage, chasm, gap, seam, splay She yawned during his lecture.她在他的课上不停地打呵欠。
n. 把手；瘤；球形突出物 vi. 鼓起 vt. 使有球形突出物 同义词:handle, node, summon up, belly The stigma is the sticky knob at the top of the pistil .柱头是长在雌蕊最顶端的带有粘性的球。
vt. 责备；归咎于 n. 责备；责任；过失 同义词:talk to, tell off, duty, liability, error, burden, trust I don't blame you for being angry.我不怪你生气。
vt. 削尖；磨快；使敏捷；加重 vi. 尖锐；变锋利 同义词:aggravate, grind to sharpen a knife磨刀
vt. 投资；覆盖；耗费；授予；包围 vi. 投资，入股；花钱买 同义词:fund, award, give, house, sheet, invent money in, plow into to invest money in stocks投资股票
adj. 冰淇淋的；乳白色的 n. 冰淇淋 同义词:milky, opalescent, ice, gelato I like chocolate ice-cream .我喜欢巧克力冰淇淋。
vt. 承担；假定；采取；呈现 vi. 装腔作势；多管闲事 同义词:undertake, adopt, accept, shoulder, sustain, attitudinize, put on the dog The situation assumed a threatening character.形势显得很险恶。

vi. 起媒介作用 adj. 中间的，中级的 n. [化学] 中间物；媒介 同义词:mid, medium, middle, secondary, medium, intermediary agent The reason is that parts and components from China are important intermediate inputs into US exports .原因是，中国的零部件和组件是美国出口重要的的中间投入。
adj. 彻底的；十分的；周密的 同义词:complete, radical We have asked our service department to have thorough investigation of the complaint .我们已经要求我们的服务部门对该投诉做彻底的调查。
prep. 超过；越过；那一边；在...较远的一边 adv. 在远处；在更远处 n. 远处 同义词:above, without, than, over, past, away, afar, yon Beyond those trees you'll find a summer house.在树林的那边你将找到一间避暑别墅。

adj. 向内的；内部的；精神的；本质上的；熟悉的 adv. 向内；内心里 n. 内部；内脏；密友 同义词:internal, inner, mental, familiar, spiritual, inboard, interior, inner, inside, familiar The net effect is that the particle is pushed inward .最后的净效应就是粒子被向内推。
n. 职员，办事员；店员；书记；记帐员 vi. 当销售员，当店员 同义词:secretary, office staff Three years ago he clerked in a bank.三年前他在一家银行里当职员。
vt. 使习惯于 同义词:habituate We had to get accustomed to the new working conditions.我们必须渐渐适应新的工作条件。
vi. 熔化，溶解；渐混 vt. 使融化；使熔化；使软化；使感动 n. 熔化；熔化物 同义词:flux, fuse, oil, soften up, fusion, burnoff Great heat melts iron.高温使铁熔化。
n. 斗蓬；宽大外衣；托词 vt. 遮掩；隐匿 同义词:subterfuge, cloke, overcurtain, obscure She was cloaked in red silk.她披着红丝斗篷。

n. 职业；占有；消遣；占有期 同义词:profession, employment, career, calling, pursuit, entertainment The happiness and satisfaction we can get from occupation and work are much more than most of us expect .职业和工作在使人得到幸福与满足方面所起的作用比我们大多数意识到的要多得多。
n. 汽油 同义词:gas, benzine Mixing and igniting gasoline and oxygen in an engine generates turbulence .在引擎内混合汽油与氧气然后点火，会产生紊流。
vt. 计算；估算；用计算机计算 vi. 计算；估算；推断 n. 计算；估计；推断 同义词:cast, figure, figure, cast, calculation, estimation, appraisal, valuation, count Who can compute the distance of the moon from the earth?谁能计算出月球与地球的距离?
adj. 勤勉的；用功的，费尽心血的 同义词:industrious, hard-working He is a most diligent student .他是极其勤奋的学生。
n. 事情；事务；私事；（尤指关系不长久的）风流韵事 同义词:thing, transaction, relations, business It was a strange affair .那是一次奇特的经历。
adv. 近来，不久前 同义词:of late, odd-come-shortly Have you seen any good shows lately ?你最近看过什么好的演出吗?。
n. 敌人，仇敌；敌军 adj. 敌人的，敌方的 同义词:foe, hostes, hostile They defended the castle against enemy .他们保卫城堡不让敌人攻入。
n. 到来；到达；到达者 同义词:coming, advent I have been expecting your arrival .我一直盼望着您的到来。
vt. 张贴，裱糊；用浆糊粘 n. 面团，膏；糊状物，[胶粘] 浆糊 同义词:post, mash Please paste these coloured sheets of paper together.请把这几张彩纸粘在一起。
n. 代理，中介；代理处，经销处 同义词:procuration, intermediary agent Which agency would then wish to appear before Congress ?会有哪家机构希望到美国国会作证呢？
vi. 醒来；唤醒；警觉 vt. 叫醒；激发 n. 尾迹；守夜；守丧 同义词:awake, arouse, inspire, make someone tick, vigil, night watch I wake at seven every morning.我每天早晨七点醒来。
vt. 发现；认为；感到；获得 vi. 裁决 n. 发现 同义词:detect, earn, acquire, expect, count, discovery, occurrence, detection, anagnorisis He found a few coins in the car.他在汽车里捡到几枚硬币。
adj. 音乐的；悦耳的 n. 音乐片 同义词:harmonious, sweet Guitar Hero is as musical as I get now .吉他英雄是我得到了非常悦耳的东西。

n. 管道；输油管；传递途径 同义词:canal, ducting If Americans do not want their oil , then Alberta will build a pipeline to the west coast and sell it to China , they say .他们说，如果美国人不想要这里生产的石油，艾伯塔省将修建一条通向西海岸的石油管线，将石油销售给中国。
n. 坐标；同等的人或物 adj. 并列的；同等的 vt. 调整；整合 vi. 协调 同义词:paratactic, tantamount, adjust, restructure, sort, concert You must coordinate the movements of your arms and legs when swimming.游泳时你必须使臂和腿的动作相协调。
n. 房东，老板；地主 同义词:boss, employer landlord put a new stove in my room .房东在我房间里放了一个新暖炉。
vi. 导电；带领 vt. 管理；引导；表现 n. 进行；行为；实施 同义词:lead through, manage, run, direct, represent, aim, going on, behavior, dealing, enforcement, administration He conducted himself in a gracious manner.他为人和蔼可亲。
adj. 有责任的，有义务的；应受罚的；有…倾向的；易…的 同义词:responsible, bound, accountable, prone I only want to know if you have anything liable for tax .我只是想知道你们有什么要上税的东西。
adj. 疲倦的；厌倦的，厌烦的 v. 疲倦；对…腻烦（tire的过去分词形式） 同义词:worn, harassed The girl tires easily.这个女孩容易疲劳。
n. 歌剧；歌剧院；歌剧团 Mike : Yuck ! I hate romance . That show sounds like a opera to me .迈克：讨厌！我不喜欢浪漫。那个节目给我的感觉象是肥皂剧。
n. 羊肉；绵羊 同义词:sheep, hotpot He dines on a chicken or a scrap of mutton .一只小鸡，或一小块羊肉，就算他一顿正餐了。
n. 架子；搁板；搁板状物 同义词:etagere, bink He was shelfed by his boss.他被老板炒了鱿鱼。
vi. 敲；打；敲击 vt. 敲；打；敲击；批评 n. 敲；敲打；爆震声 同义词:strike, hit, strike, stroke, dong, beating to knock somebody on the head打某人的头
adj. 滑的；狡猾的；不稳定的 同义词:designing, knowing, subtle, unstable Then totally out of character mother twirled one spin of a waltz on the slippery sidewalk .然后，母亲完全一反常态地在打滑的人行道上跳着华尔兹舞步转了个圈。
adj. 疯狂的；狂热的，着迷的 同义词:wild, possessed, mad, enthusiastic, insane The bond markets would go crazy otherwise .否则，债券市场将上演疯狂走势。

n. 印象；效果，影响；压痕，印记；感想 同义词:infection, effect, influence, affection, print You certainly don't want to leave a bad impression .当然，你肯定不会希望留下一个坏的印象吧。
adj. 尴尬的；笨拙的；棘手的；不合适的 同义词:testing, embarrassed It is an identity that revolves around neutrality , and, yes , an awkward tradition of citizens' referendums .这是一个徘徊在中立周围的身份，也是一个对公民公投尴尬的传统。
vt. 使复杂化；使恶化；使卷入 同义词:aggravate, exacerbate You mustn’t complicate the problem by raising new issues.你千万不要提出新的争端使问题更加复杂化。
vt. 考虑；认为；考虑到；细想 vi. 考虑；认为；细想 同义词:expect, find, guess, feel, view, allow, think about, pore You have to consider what to do next.你必须考虑下一步该做什么。
adj. 寂寞的；偏僻的 n. 孤独者 同义词:remote, doleful I am now a lonely being , disunited from society .我现在是一个孤独的人，与社会隔离了。
n. 海湾；深渊；分歧；漩涡 vt. 吞没 同义词:bay, deep, variance, engulf, swallow It placed more than 500 reporters from around the world with forces in the Gulf .他们在海湾的部队中安排了500多名来自世界各地的记者。
vt. 否定，否认；拒绝给予；拒绝…的要求 vi. 否认；拒绝 同义词:negative, disavow, object, refuse to deny an accusation否认指控，否认被指控的罪状
n. 牛奶；乳状物 vt. 榨取；挤…的奶 vi. 挤奶 同义词:lait, creamery, extract, ream The farmer milks the cows twice a day.那农夫一天挤两次母牛的奶。
n. 队列；长队；辫子 vi. 排队；排队等候 vt. 将…梳成辫子；使…排队 同义词:train, alignment, tail, rank, line up for, stand in a line They queued to get into the cinema.他们排队等候进入电影院。
adj. 愚蠢的；傻的 同义词:stupid, silly, mad, softheaded I am not denying that women are foolish ; god almighty made them to match the men .我不是在否定女人愚蠢，是全能的上帝把她们造成配合男人的。
adj. 粗糙的；天然的，未加工的；粗鲁的 n. 原油；天然的物质 同义词:rough, native, robust, raw, coarse Brent crude futures have fallen to 55 dollars a barrel .北海布伦特原油期货收于每桶55美元。
n. 零点，零度 num. 零 同义词:nullity Zero choice is the fastest route to low quality .零选择是通向低质量的最快捷路线。
n. 蔬菜；植物；植物人 adj. 蔬菜的；植物的 同义词:plant, greenstuff, floral, botanic Potatoes are a very popular vegetable in North America .土豆在北美是一种非常受欢迎的蔬菜。

adj. 不同的；多种多样的；变化多的 同义词:different, unlike, varying, another, dissimilar They then proceed to use this analytical framework to explore subjects as diverse as cancer , pregnancy , mate choice , literature and religion .于是，他们着手利用这一分析框架，探讨癌症、怀孕、择偶、文学和宗教等多种多样的主题。
n. 染料；染色 vt. 染；把…染上颜色 vi. 被染色 同义词:dyeing, dyestuff, tint He dyed the dress blue.他把衣服染成蓝色。
n. 王座；君主；王权 vi. 登上王座 vt. 使登王位 同义词:emperor, crown, sovereignty Queen Elizabeth Ⅱ was throned in 1952.英国女王伊丽莎白二世于1952年登上王位。
n. 外甥女，侄女 I did so and sent my niece a gift card to replace the "unwanted" present .我收回了我的礼物，送了张礼品卡以替代那个不受欢迎的礼物。
n. 气味；嗅觉；痕迹；察觉能力 vt. 闻到；发觉；使充满…的气味；循着遗臭追踪 vi. 发出…的气味；有…的迹象；嗅着气味追赶 同义词:smell, nose, mark, wind, trace, discover, wake to, show evidence of to scent a whiff of fragrance闻到一股香味
adj. 灵活的；柔韧的；易弯曲的 同义词:elastic, pliable By this reckoning , a flexible body learns to acclimatize to stresses .由此可以判断，灵活可塑的身体学会适应压力。
n. 大洋洲 Oceania was at war with Eurasia : therefore Oceania had always been at war with Eurasia .大洋国在跟欧亚国打仗，由此推之，它也便一直在跟欧亚国打仗。
n. 同时代的人；同时期的东西 adj. 当代的；同时代的；属于同一时期的 同义词:coeval, modern-day, cotemporary This play is the image of contemporary urban life .这个剧本是当代城市生活的生动写照。
vt. 代表；表现；描绘；回忆；再赠送 vi. 代表；提出异议 同义词:conduct oneself, bear oneself, trace, figure, to stand for, stand for sth This mark represents a village.这个符号表示村庄。
adj. 情绪的；易激动的；感动人的 同义词:excitable, nervy Some people are known as " emotional eaters ".有些人被认为是“情绪进食者”。
n. [脊椎] 斑马 adj. 有斑纹的 同义词:zabra, brinded, freaked No . it 's zebra .不是。那是一匹斑马。
n. 细菌 同义词:microbe, bacilus Both bacteria and viruses can cause it .细菌和病毒都可能导致这种病。

n. 注意；尊重；问候；凝视 vt. 注重，考虑；看待；尊敬；把…看作；与…有关 vi. 注意，注重；注视 同义词:estimation, respect, notice, publicity, view, study, honor, think about, take care of, watch She regarded her husband with wide eyes.她瞪着大眼睛凝视着丈夫。
n. 钱包，皮夹 同义词:bag, purse A young lady handed in a brown wallet yesterday .昨天一位年轻女士交来一个棕色钱包。
adj. 无常的；含糊的；靠不住的；迟疑不决的 同义词:changeable, vague Because of this , it is still uncertain who invented TV .正因为此，至今还未能确定是谁发明了电视。
n. 半径，半径范围；[解剖] 桡骨；辐射光线；有效航程 同义词:semidiameter Analysis the reasons and methods of radius compensation in round turning tool .分析了数控车床中圆头车刀刀具半径补偿的原因及方法。
adj. 空的；赤裸的，无遮蔽的 vt. 露出，使赤裸 同义词:empty, hollow, vacant, show up to bare one's arms露出手臂
n. 颜色；肤色；颜料；脸色 vt. 粉饰；给...涂颜色；歪曲 vi. 变色；获得颜色 同义词:paint, farbe, sugar, prettify, discolor What color is this bird ?这只鸟是什么颜色的？
n. [化学] 碳；碳棒；复写纸 adj. 碳的；碳处理的 同义词:kryptol A price on carbon , he argues , would threaten it.他认为，煤炭的价格会威胁到制造业。
n. 几分；某物 adv. 有点；多少；几分；稍微 同义词:how, any On the other hand, compared with Americans , Europeans cling to a somewhat static view of society .另一方面，同美国人相比，欧洲人对社会有一种某种程度上固有的观念。
adv. 清楚地，当然；明确地，肯定地 同义词:certainly, surely, specifically, particularly, plain " China is definitely not the cheapest place to produce any more, " he says .“中国肯定不再是生产什么成本都是最低的地方了”，他说。

n. 助手，大副；配偶；同事；配对物 vt. 使配对；使一致；结伴 vi. 交配；成配偶；紧密配合 同义词:friend, assistant, brother, aid, fellow, accord, unify, copulate, close fit This result raises the problem , though , of what happens to the parasite when infected females fail to find a mate .不过这个结论引起了问题：要是感染的雌性无法找到伴侣，那麽寄生菌的命运会怎样？
n. 沐浴；浴室；浴盆 vt. 洗澡 vi. 洗澡 同义词:ablutions, bagnio, wash oneself, wash oneself She's bathing her baby.她正在给她婴孩洗澡。
vt. 解散；解雇；开除；让...离开 vi. 解散 同义词:remove, fire out, disband, break up The teacher dismissed the class early.老师早下课。
n. 块；街区；大厦；障碍物 vt. 阻止；阻塞；限制 adj. 成批的，大块的；交通堵塞的 同义词:piece, mass, barrier, bottleneck, stem, dispute, prohibit, discourage, batched, wholescale to block a legislation阻挠一项立法(的通过)
vt. 建造，构造；创立 n. 构想，概念 同义词:found, institute, frame, structure, father, concept, formulation, idea, notion Can we construct a model that balances innovation and responsibility ?我们能否创建一种平衡创新与责任的模式呢？
n. 口香糖；树胶；橡皮 vt. 用胶粘，涂以树胶；使…有粘性 同义词:chutty, cachou He gummed the back of stamps.他在邮票的背面涂上胶。
n. 反馈；成果，资料；回复 同义词:production, outcome, information One very important caveat : Do not , I repeat , do not rely on feedback from your nearest and dearest .一个非常重要的告诫：不要--我再次重复--不要依赖于你最亲密、最亲爱的人的反馈。
n. 访问者，参观者；视察者；候鸟 同义词:transient, fetcher Visitor : The large area nearby is the Urban Best Practices Area ( UBPA ), isn 't it?参观者：那旁边的一大片应该就是城市最佳实践区了，是吗？
adj. 经济的；节约的；合算的 同义词:managing, paying, saving Engineers are forever seeking more economical methods of solving old problems .工程师们常常探索解决老问题的更加经济的办法。
n. 被子；棉被 vt. 东拼西凑地编；加软衬料后缝制 vi. 缝被子 同义词:bedquilt, comforter His mother quilted a cotton-padded anorak for him.他的母亲给他缝制了一件棉猴儿。
adj. 激烈的；狂怒的；热烈兴奋的；喧闹的 同义词:acute, stinging It is furious about the Iraq war and George Bush .伊拉克战争和乔治。布什都让它很恼火。
n. 木偶；傀儡；受他人操纵的人 同义词:cipher in algorism, fantoccini So , while poor Geppetto shivered at home without a jacket , Pinocchio sat at a puppet show .因此，当可怜的格培多没有夹克穿在家里发抖时，皮诺奇却在看木偶秀。
n. 神经；勇气；[植] 叶脉 vt. 鼓起勇气 同义词:courage, heart, take courage, get up the courage She was finally nerved to tell him that she was already a wife.她终于鼓起勇气告诉他，她已经为人之妻了。

adj. 光学的；眼睛的，视觉的 同义词:visual, ocular But at each end of the fibre , optical signals must be converted to and from the electrical signals that computers use to process information .但在纤维的各端，必须将光信号转换成电信号或者将电信号转换成光信号，计算机用电信号处理信息。
adj. 精确的 同义词:precise, mathematical, strict, rigid, refined Now a more accurate method has been found .现在已经找到一种更精确的方法。
vi. 消失；突然不见；成为零 vt. 使不见，使消失 n. 弱化音 同义词:disappear, blank, unmake The mysterious woman passenger vanished.这位神秘的女乘客突然不见了。
adv. 恰好地；正是；精确地；正确地 同义词:accurately, correctly, properly, precisely, right That, I think , exactly his aim .我认为，这正是他的目的所在。
n. 性格，品质；特性；角色；[计] 字符 vt. 印，刻；使具有特征 同义词:quality, role, workers, identity, tang, print... You can not copy and paste between windows with different character set encoding .不能在以不同字符集编码的窗口之间进行复制和粘贴。
n. 大街；林荫大道 同义词:main street, high street I live on Ninth Avenue .我住在第九大街上。
adj. 不可缺少的；绝对必要的；责无旁贷的 n. 不可缺少之物；必不可少的人 同义词:obbligato Your help is indispensable to me .你的帮助对我是绝对必要的。
